name: A Small Journey
description:
Explore a small world with Avis, a travelling ghost, as she helps the valley's guardian, Willow, find his keys to unlock the passage to a hidden world.

A SMALL JOURNEY is a visual novel/point and click adventure created in Ren'Py. Relax and explore the map locations as you help Avis and Willow find keys to unlock the doors to the Moonlight's Core.

This was a fun challenge to create. The visual style is inspired by point and click games and comics which is why the textboxes move depending on the scene and character talking. The gameplay and story is simple with one ending. You can play through the game as slow or as fast as you desire.

Play time is around 5-10 minutes. It depends on how much you choose to explore the locations.

Game features:
  • 1 ending with a simple story
  • 9 unique locations to see
  • Simple gameplay
